Actions.Name: Line Breaker
Actions.Description: The Mechanist summons an explosive charge, a size 1 summon with 1 hp, in range 6. The charge can be targeted by any character and is automatically hit by attacks. When the charge is destroyed, it explodes in a blast 2 area. Characters inside take [fray] damage, become burning, and are shoved 1 away from the center. Burning foes are stunned.

Actions.Name: Flame Hurler
Actions.Description: The mechanist sprays flame in a line 3 area in range 5. Foes in the area are marked.
Actions.Mark: While marked, they are branded+, burning, and cannot dash. They or an adjacent ally can spend 1 action putting the flames out, ending the mark.
